ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and cultivated fields and palms with supple spathes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The fields of corn and date-palm trees with soft and tender spathes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and cornfields and date-palms laden with juicy fruits?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: farms, and palm-trees in thick groves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And fields and palm-trees, with delicate tendrils?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And crops and date palms with soft clusters."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And cornfields and palm-trees having fine spadices?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: sown fields, and palms with slender spathes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And tilled fields and heavy-sheathed palm-trees,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and cornfields, and palm-trees laden with fruit --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And corn-fields and palm-trees whereof the spathes are fine?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: farms and date palms with dainty spathes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And corn-fields and date-palms with spathes near breaking (with the weight of fruit)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And green crops (fields etc.) and date-palms with soft spadix.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: sown fields and palmtrees, with slender spathes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And fields, and palm-trees whose fruits are delicious?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:148] and farms and date palms with slender, delicate and tender, spathes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And tilled fields and heavy sheathed palm-trees) bearing ripe and seemly fruits,
